source.title: CNN anchor reveals second diagnosis of 'fairly rare' form of ovarian cancer - New York Post
source.name: New York Post

facts: CNN anchor disclosed a second diagnosis
Disease had returned after being off the air for a month
Doctors described it as 'fairly rare' form of ovarian cancer

neutral.headline: CNN anchor discloses second diagnosis with fairly rare type of recurrent ovarian cancer.
neutral.body_html: After a month off the air, Christiane Amanpour, veteran journalist and CNN anchor, has revealed that she was re-diagnosed with an 'ovarian cancer' which doctors have described as being of a fairly rare type. The recurrence comes after her initial diagnosis.

conservative.headline: CNN Anchor Reveals Recurrent Ovarian Cancer Diagnosis.
conservative.body_html: Christiane Amanpour, a respected journalist and CNN anchor who took time off the air recently due to health concerns, has disclosed that she was re-diagnosed with ovarian cancer. Doctors have described this as being of a fairly rare type.

liberal.headline: CNN Anchor Reveals Recurrent Ovarian Cancer Diagnosis, Demands Better Healthcare Access.
liberal.body_html: Christiane Amanpour, a veteran journalist and CNN anchor who recently took time off the air due to health concerns, has disclosed that she was re-diagnosed with ovarian cancer. Doctors have described this as being of a fairly rare type.
